name: Ember: Reignition
description:
Ember: Reignition is a local multiplayer competitive fighting game in which you and your friends play as a lost knight and his spectral adversary, engaging in combat to determine the final survivor.


Use your sword skills and instinct to target the weakness of your opponent. Master the art of defensive timing, responding effectively to your opponent's assaults, and building up unique combos to augment your strategic advantage!

  • Choose wisely on defense mechanisms to avoid the incoming attack and punish your opponents.
  • Construct a series of combos with normal, charged, and aerial attacks.
  • Immerse yourself in the soul-like battle experience with multiple battle soundtracks.


In a realm where humanity is subjugated by the Sun God. All rebellions are vehemently suppressed, while the valiant warriors opposing the god are consequently incinerated into ashes. As retribution for their sacrilege, the god revives these warriors, imprisoning their souls in an unending cycle. The only option for warriors is fighting against their spectral copy as entertainment for the omnipotent Sun God.
